thread.title: Flybe scrap key flight route
thread.title_full: Flybe scrap key flight route | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Flybe scrap key flight route
text:
Credit: Paul Faith / PA Archive/PA Images Flybe has announced it is scrapping a key flight route between Jersey and East Midlands.
The last service will be on the 24th October.
Passengers travelling to Nottingham, Derby and Leicester will lose out in the move.
Flybe say the low number of passengers make the flight environmentally and economically 'hard to justify'.
Last updated Tue 6 Oct 2015 Travel
